title: can't connect to a game !
body:
hi guys i can't connect to any game fight ! i started the game and choose the champions then "connection error appears" ! 
the progress stuck at 0% and can't reconnect to the game . help me plzzz

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble establishing a connection to the game server.  I suggest going through a series of steps provided in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if your issue persists afterwards!
